abstract: A repeat of CBS’s “Two and a Half Men” delivered Monday night’s top broadcast TV ratings, drawing 8.6 million viewers at 9 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
snippet: A repeat of CBS’s “Two and a Half Men” delivered Monday night’s top broadcast TV ratings, drawing 8.6 million viewers at 9 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: A repeat of CBS’s “Two and a Half Men” delivered Monday night’s top broadcast ratings, drawing 8.6 million viewers at 9 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Monday Ratings: CBS Repeats Win Again
